code: import ExpoFontLoader from'./ExpoFontLoader';export const loadPromises={};let cache={};export function markLoaded(fontFamily){cache[fontFamily]=true;}export function isLoadedInCache(fontFamily){return fontFamily in cache;}export function isLoadedNative(fontFamily){if(isLoadedInCache(fontFamily)){return true;}else{const loadedNativeFonts=ExpoFontLoader.getLoadedFonts();loadedNativeFonts.forEach(font=>{cache[font]=true;});return fontFamily in cache;}}export function purgeFontFamilyFromCache(fontFamily){delete cache[fontFamily];}export function purgeCache(){cache={};}
